title: Elton John: Still Standing | Clean Living and Good Juju, with Jujubee | 5
description:
With his Farewell Yellow Brick Road tour back in full swing, Elton looks poised to ride off into the sunset in style. But when he does finally hang up the platform boots, his legacy will still be dazzling. He’s set the stage for the next generation of LGBTQ+ performers, like Jujubee. She’s a four-time competitor on RuPaul’s Drag Race and host of Wondery’s new dating show, Queen of Hearts. On today’s episode, Aricia and Juju get real about navigating sobriety in the limelight, Elton’s best looks, and one of our toughest Would-You-Rathers yet: A life without fake lashes, or without contouring?


Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/eventherich
